name: Soul Journey
description:
You are a knight who has fallen in battle. On your way to the afterlife your soul was cursed by the people you killed and consequently you were trapped in Limbo. Here you cannot die and unless you reach the shrine and rid yourself of the curse binding you, you will be stuck and doomed to repeat the journey forever.

This is my first 2D game and as a result is very simple and crude but it's a good starting point. I'd really appreciate any feedback and criticism(as long as it's constructive) as to how I can improve my skills :D
